context_bundle.summary: CVarMaster WoW addon v1.0.3 - WeakAura export, profile sharing, base64 encoding. 893 CVars, GUI browser, 17 categories, combat protection.

known_errors: UI scale CVars (uiScale, renderScale) require /reload to prevent instability
Combat-protected CVars blocked during combat with warning message
gxApi, gxResolution, graphicsQuality need logout to fully apply
Slash command registration must be at top level of main .lua file
OptionsSliderTemplate needed for proper slider behavior
onboarding.quick_start:
Location: X:\dev\CVarMaster\ (dev), Y:\...\AddOns\CVarMaster\ (installed)
Slash: /cvm (toggle GUI)
Version: 1.0.3 (WeakAura export)
Published: Wago.io, CurseForge
New 1.0.3: WeakAuraExport.lua, Base64 Utils, Profile import/export (!CVM: format), Combat warnings
